entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
